response:
Investigations should urgently confirm or exclude surgically treatable thoracic cord compression, then characterise intrinsic cord disease and screen for systemic, infectious or metabolic causes of myelopathy.

investigations = ["MRI of whole spine with gadolinium contrast", "MRI brain with gadolinium contrast", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "Coagulation screen", "Serum vitamin B12", "Serum folate", "Serum copper and ceruloplasmin", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Serum C-reactive protein", "Thyroid function tests", "HbA1c", "Serum protein electrophoresis and immunofixation", "HIV serology", "Syphilis serology (VDRL/TPPA)", "Autoimmune screen including ANA, ENA and dsDNA", "Aquaporin-4 antibody", "Myelin oligodendrocyte glycoprotein (MOG) antibody", "Lumbar puncture with CSF analysis including cells, protein, glucose and oligoclonal bands", "CT chest, abdomen and pelvis with contrast"]
